moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Hyper Fang
moves.description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Yawn
moves.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Super Fang
moves.description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target's HP to half.

moves.name: Superpower
moves.description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, it also lowers the user's Attack and Defense.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.
